a sāmarthye vastu eva na syāt

analyzed: bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam

ubhaya jñāna hetu tvam syāt

original: 15405 pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-

api tathā syāt na
vyatireka vyavacchedasya bhāva rūpa tvāt
na bhāva rūpa vyavacchede bhāva anuṣaṅgaḥ

kriyā bhoga adhiṣṭhāna asvatantraḥ hi ātmā nirātmā
tat svātantrya
lakṣaṇa tvāt ātmanaḥ
tat rūpam nairātmyam na ātma nivṛtti

original: 15415 mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
analyzed: mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtaka tva ādya yogāt na tatas nairātmya
siddhiḥ syāt
ātma vyavacchedena nirātmanaḥ bhāvasya parāmarśāt
adoṣaḥ iti ced
paryudāsena vastu saṃsparśāt tat eva
vastu rūpam nairātmyam āyātam
yasya api na abhāva rūpaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: 15419 tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti

original: 15423 dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tad abhāve ca na asti iti svayam na bhavat api prāṇa ādīnām
na ātmani siddhim upasthāpayati

nairātmye abhāvāt prāṇa
ādayaḥ tad nirasanāḥ na ātma aupasthāpanāḥ
tatra bhāva asiddheḥ
na ca nairātmya nivṛttyā ātma siddhiḥ syāt
vipakṣa vyatireka darśane
api prasaṅgāt

original: 15430 siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: siddhau api tad asiddhiḥ iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ
tat na ananvayā
mithyāartha tāyāḥ tu pauruṣeya tvena vyāptyā

original: 15502 dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-

saḥ eṣa varṇānām
